name: Anglo-Saxon 'Cotton' Map of the World (c.1025-1050)
description: One of the earliest medieval maps showing Britain. Mappa mundi from the Cotton collection. British Library Cotton MS Tiberius B.V.
notes:
BL Cotton MS Tiberius B.V, f. 56v.
Also known as the 'Cottonian' or 'Anglo-Saxon' world map.
One of the earliest medieval mappae mundi showing recognizable Britain.
Britain shown in the top-left corner.
Dated c.1025-1050, possibly from Canterbury.
BL Digitised Manuscripts collection.
